job_purpose: As a Data Engineer at The Perth Mint, you will play a crucial role in ensuring project and enterprise goals align with data solutions. You will be responsible for extracting, transforming, and loading data using Azure, SQL, and other technologies to meet project requirements and enhance data quality and reliability across the organization.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Work with Project and Data & Analytics teams to align project goals with data solutions
Extract, transform, and load data using Azure, SQL, and other technologies
Assemble large, complex data sets to meet business and project requirements
Improve data quality, integrity, and reliability across the organization's data systems
Design and implement process improvements for scalability and automation
Assist in designing and operating components of the organization's data architecture
Build analytical tools to provide actionable insights into key business metrics
Contribute to the organization's Data Architecture and standards
Address data infrastructure needs and technical issues in collaboration with the Data & Analytics team
required_qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Data Engineering, Analytics, Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field
5+ years of experience in data engineering
Experience with Microsoft Azure Data and Machine Learning services
Experience with SQL Server and PostgreSQL
company_details: The Perth Mint is an iconic Western Australian organization with a global presence. It offers diverse roles and fosters a workplace culture rooted in history, sustainability, and inclusion. Employees benefit from competitive salaries, flexible work options, training opportunities, and a commitment to diversity and equality.
